    Spring Security Ï†ÅÏö©ÌïòÍ∏∞

    Spring Security 5.7 Î≤ÑÏ†ÑÎ∂ÄÌÑ∞ Í∏∞Ï°¥Ïóê ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÎçò Ïä§ÌîÑÎßÅ ÏãúÌÅêÎ¶¨Ìã∞ Ï†ÅÏö© Î∞©ÏãùÍ≥º ÎßéÏù¥ Îã¨ÎùºÏ°åÎã§. Ïù¥ Î∂ÄÎ∂ÑÏóê ÎåÄÌï¥ Ï†ïÎ¶¨ÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ Ïù¥ Ìè¨Ïä§Ìä∏Î•º ÏûëÏÑ±ÌïòÍ≤å ÎêòÏóàÎã§.

    Spring SecurityÏôÄ Í¥ÄÎ†®Îêú Ìè¨Ïä§Ìä∏Îäî ÎëêÎ≤àÏóê Í±∞Ï≥ê ÏûëÏÑ±Ìï† ÏòàÏ†ïÏù¥Îã§.

    Ïù¥Î≤à Ìè¨Ïä§Ìä∏Îäî Spring SecurityÎ•º Ï†ÅÏö©ÌïòÎäî Î∞©Î≤ïÏóê ÎåÄÌï¥ ÏûëÏÑ±Ìï† Í≤ÉÏù¥Í≥† Îã§Ïùå Ìè¨Ïä§Ìä∏Îäî ÏûëÏÑ± Ïä§ÌîÑÎßÅ ÏãúÌÅêÎ¶¨Ìã∞Î•º ÌÖåÏä§Ìä∏ ÏΩîÎìúÏóê Ïñ¥ÎñªÍ≤å Ï†ÅÏö©Ìï† ÏßÄÏóê ÎåÄÌï¥ ÏûëÏÑ±ÌïòÎèÑÎ°ù ÌïòÍ≤†Îã§.

    Ïù¥Ï†ú Spring SecurityÎ•º Ï†ÅÏö©ÌïòÎäî Î∞©Î≤ïÏóê ÎåÄÌï¥ ÏïåÏïÑÎ≥¥Ïûê.

    dependency Ï∂îÍ∞Ä

    Î®ºÏ†Ä Ïä§ÌîÑÎßÅ ÏãúÌÅêÎ¶¨Ìã∞Î•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌïú ÎîîÌéúÎçòÏãúÎ•º Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌï¥ÏïºÌïúÎã§. Ï∞∏Í≥†Î°ú spring-boot-starter-thymeleafÎ•º Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌïú Ïù¥Ïú†Îäî ÌÉÄÏûÑÎ¶¨ÌîÑÏóêÏÑú ÏãúÌÅêÎ¶¨Ìã∞ Í¥ÄÎ†® ÎÇ¥Ïö©ÏùÑ ÏûëÏÑ±Ìï† Îïå ÌïÑÏöîÌïú ÎîîÌéúÎçòÏãúÏù∏ thymeleaf-extras-springsecurity5ÏùÑ Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ÏÑúÏù¥Îã§.

    build.gradle

    dependencies {
    implementation 'org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-thymeleaf'
    implementation 'org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-security'
    implementation 'org.thymeleaf.extras:thymeleaf-extras-springsecurity5'
    testImplementation 'org.springframework.security:spring-security-test'
}

    HttpSecurity Íµ¨ÏÑ±

    Ïù¥Ï†ú Î≥∏Í≤©Ï†ÅÏúºÎ°ú ÏãúÌÅêÎ¶¨Ìã∞Î•º Ï†ÅÏö©ÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌïú ÏΩîÎìúÎ•º ÏûëÏÑ±Ìï¥Î≥¥Ïûê.

    Í∏∞Ï°¥Ïùò ÏãúÌÅêÎ¶¨Ìã∞ Í¥ÄÎ†® ÏÑ§Ï†ïÏùÄ WebSecurityConfigurerAdapterÎ•º ÏÉÅÏÜçÎ∞õÏïÑ ÏûëÏÑ±ÌïòÏòÄÎã§. ÌïòÏßÄÎßå Ïä§ÌîÑÎßÅ ÏãúÌÅêÎ¶¨Ìã∞ 5.7Î∂ÄÌÑ∞Îäî SecurityFilterChainÏùÑ ÎπàÏúºÎ°ú Îì±Î°ùÌïòÏó¨ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÎäî Í≤ÉÏúºÎ°ú Î∞îÎÄåÏóàÎã§. WebSecurityConfigurerAdapterÎäî deprecated ÎêòÏóàÏúºÎØÄÎ°ú ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÏßÄ ÏïäÎäî Í≤ÉÏù¥ Ï¢ãÎã§.

    @Configuration
public class SecurityConfig extends WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter {

    @Override
    protected void configure(HttpSecurity http) throws Exception {
        http
            .authorizeHttpRequests((authz) -> authz
                .anyRequest().authenticated()
            )
            .httpBasic(withDefaults());
    }
}

    SecurityFilterChainÏùÑ ÎπàÏúºÎ°ú Îì±Î°ùÌïòÏó¨ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÎ©¥ Îã§ÏùåÍ≥º Í∞ôÎã§.

    @Bean
public SecurityFilterChain filterChain(HttpSecurity http) throws Exception {
    return http
            .authorizeHttpRequests(auth -> auth
                    .mvcMatchers(
                            HttpMethod.GET,
                            "/",
                            "/articles",
                            "/articles/search-hashtag"
                    ).permitAll()
                    .anyRequest().authenticated()
            )
            .formLogin().and()
            .logout()
            .logoutSuccessUrl("/")
            .and()
            .build();
}

    WebSercurity Íµ¨ÏÑ±

    Ïä§ÌîÑÎßÅ ÏãúÌÅêÎ¶¨Ìã∞ 5.7 Ïù¥Ï†ÑÏóî Ï†ïÏ†Å Î¶¨ÏÜåÏä§(css, js Îì±)Î•º Î¨¥ÏãúÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ ÏïÑÎûòÏôÄ Í∞ôÏùÄ ÏΩîÎìúÎ•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌñàÏóàÎã§.

    @Configuration
public class SecurityConfiguration extends WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter {

    @Override
    public void configure(WebSecurity web) {
        web.ignoring().antMatchers("/ignore1", "/ignore2");
    }

}

    Ïù¥ Ïó≠ÏãúÎèÑ Í∏∞Ï°¥Ïóê ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÎçò WebSecurityConfigurerAdapterÏù¥ deprecated ÎêòÏóàÍ∏∞ ÎïåÎ¨∏Ïóê ÏïÑÎûòÏôÄ Í∞ôÏùÄ ÏÉàÎ°úÏö¥ Î∞©ÏãùÏúºÎ°ú Ï†ÅÏö©Ìï¥Ïïº ÌïúÎã§. WebSecurityCustomizerÏóê Í≤ΩÎ°úÎ•º ÏûëÏÑ±ÌïòÍ≤å ÎêòÎ©¥ Ïä§ÌîÑÎßÅ ÏãúÌÅêÎ¶¨Ìã∞ Í≤ÄÏÇ¨ÏóêÏÑú ÏïÑÏòà Ï†úÏô∏ÎêúÎã§.

    @Configuration
public class SecurityConfiguration {

    @Bean
    public WebSecurityCustomizer webSecurityCustomizer() {
        return (web) -> web.ignoring().antMatchers("/ignore1", "/ignore2");
    }
}

    ÏúÑÏùò ÏΩîÎìú Ï≤òÎüº Í≤ΩÎ°úÎ•º ÌïòÎÇòÏî© ÏßÄÏ†ïÌï¥Ï£ºÏñ¥ÎèÑ ÎêòÏßÄÎßå Ïä§ÌîÑÎßÅÏóêÏÑú Ï†úÍ≥µÌïòÎäî Ï†ïÏ†Å Î¶¨ÏÜåÏä§ Í≤ΩÎ°úÍ∞Ä ÏûàÎã§. Í∑∏ ÎÇ¥Ïö©ÏùÑ Ï†ÅÏö©ÌïòÎ©¥ ÏïÑÎûòÏôÄ Í∞ôÎã§.

    @Configuration
public class SecurityConfiguration {

    @Bean
    public WebSecurityCustomizer webSecurityCustomizer() {
        return (web) -> web.ignoring()
                .requestMatchers(PathRequest.toStaticResources().atCommonLocations());
    }
}

    Í∑∏Îü∞Îç∞, WebSecurityCustomizerÎ•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÍ≤å ÎêòÎ©¥ Ïï†ÌîåÎ¶¨ÏºÄÏù¥ÏÖò ÏãúÏûëÌï† Îïå warnÏù¥ Î∞úÏÉùÌïòÎäîÎç∞ Í∑∏ ÎÇ¥Ïö©ÏùÄ HttpSecurityÏóêÏÑú ÏûëÏÑ±ÌïòÎäî Î∞©ÏãùÏúºÎ°ú ÌïòÎäî Í≤ÉÏùÑ Ï∂îÏ≤úÌïúÎã§Í≥† ÌïúÎã§.

    Îî∞ÎùºÏÑú, ÏúÑÏùò ÏΩîÎìúÎäî ÏïÑÎûòÏôÄ Í∞ôÏù¥ ÏàòÏ†ïÌñàÎã§.

    @Bean
public SecurityFilterChain filterChain(HttpSecurity http) throws Exception {
    return http
            .authorizeHttpRequests(auth -> auth
                    .requestMatchers(
                            PathRequest.toStaticResources().atCommonLocations()
                    ).permitAll()
                    .mvcMatchers(
                            HttpMethod.GET,
                            "/",
                            "/articles",
                            "/articles/search-hashtag"
                    ).permitAll()
                    .anyRequest().authenticated()
            )
            .formLogin().and()
            .logout()
            .logoutSuccessUrl("/")
            .and()
            .build();
}
    • requestMatchers(PathRequest.toStaticResources().atCommonLocations()).permitAll()

    Ïù∏Ï¶ù Ï†ïÎ≥¥

    UserDetailsServiceÎ•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÏó¨ Ïù∏Ï¶ù Ï†ïÎ≥¥Î•º Í∞ÄÏ†∏Ïò®Îã§. Ïù∏Ï¶ù Ï†ïÎ≥¥Îäî DBÏóê ÏûàÏúºÎØÄÎ°ú Í≥ÑÏ†ïÍ¥ÄÎ†® Î¶¨Ìè¨ÏßÄÌÜ†Î¶¨ ÎπàÏùÑ Î∂àÎü¨ÏôÄÏïº ÌïúÎã§. (UserAccountRepository)

    @Bean
public UserDetailsService userDetailsService(UserAccountRepository userAccountRepository) {
    return username -> userAccountRepository
            .findById(username)
            .map(UserAccountDto::from)
            .map(BoardPrincipal::from)
            .orElseThrow(() -> new UsernameNotFoundException("ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÎ•º Ï∞æÏùÑ Ïàò ÏóÜÏäµÎãàÎã§. - username: " + username));
}

    ÏúÑÏùò ÏΩîÎìúÎäî UserDetailsServiceÏùò loadUserByUsernameÏùÑ ÎûåÎã§ÏãùÏúºÎ°ú Íµ¨ÌòÑÌïú Í≤ÉÏù¥Îã§. UsernameNotFoundExceptionÏùÄ loadUserByUsername Ïä§ÌéôÏóê Ï†ïÏùòÎêòÏñ¥ ÏûàÎäî Í≤ÉÏù¥Îã§.

    BoardPrincipal ÏûëÏÑ±

    BoardPrincipalÏùÄ UserDetailsÎ•º Íµ¨ÌòÑÌï¥Ïïº ÌïúÎã§. BoardPrincipalÏùÄ Î°úÍ∑∏Ïù∏Ïù¥ Îêú ÏÉÅÌÉúÎùºÎ©¥ Í≥ÑÏ†ï Ï†ïÎ≥¥Î•º Îã¥Í≥† ÏûàÎã§. ÌòÑÏû¨ BoardPrincipalÏóêÏÑúÎäî Í∂åÌïúÏóê ÎåÄÌïú Î∂ÄÎ∂ÑÏùÑ Íµ¨ÌòÑÌïòÏßÄ ÏïäÏïòÎã§. Îî∞ÎùºÏÑú, RoleTypeÏùÑ USERÎ°ú Í≥†Ï†ïÌï¥ÎëêÏóàÎã§.

    import com.test.projectboard.dto.UserAccountDto;
import lombok.Getter;
import org.springframework.security.core.GrantedAuthority;
import org.springframework.security.core.authority.SimpleGrantedAuthority;
import org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails;

import java.util.Collection;
import java.util.Set;
import java.util.stream.Collectors;

public record BoardPrincipal(
        String username,
        String password,
        Collection<? extends GrantedAuthority> authorities,
        String email,
        String nickname,
        String memo) implements UserDetails {

    public static BoardPrincipal of(String username, String password, String email, String nickname, String memo) {
        Set<RoleType> roleTypes = Set.of(RoleType.USER);

        return new BoardPrincipal(
                username,
                password,
                roleTypes.stream()
                        .map(RoleType::getName)
                        .map(SimpleGrantedAuthority::new)
                        .collect(Collectors.toUnmodifiableSet()),
                email,
                nickname,
                memo
        );
    }

    public static BoardPrincipal from(UserAccountDto dto) {
        return BoardPrincipal.of(
                dto.userId(),
                dto.userPassword(),
                dto.email(),
                dto.nickname(),
                dto.memo()
        );
    }

    public UserAccountDto toDto() {
        return UserAccountDto.of(
                username,
                password,
                email,
                nickname,
                memo
        );
    }

    @Override
    public String getUsername() {
        return username;
    }

    @Override
    public String getPassword() {
        return password;
    }

    // Í∂åÌïúÏóê ÎåÄÌïú Î∂ÄÎ∂Ñ
    @Override
    public Collection<? extends GrantedAuthority> getAuthorities() {
        return authorities;
    }

    @Override
    public boolean isAccountNonExpired() {
        return true;
    }

    @Override
    public boolean isAccountNonLocked() {
        return true;
    }

    @Override
    public boolean isCredentialsNonExpired() {
        return true;
    }

    @Override
    public boolean isEnabled() {
        return true;
    }

    public enum RoleType {
        USER("ROLE_USER");

        @Getter
        private final String name;

        RoleType(String name) {
            this.name = name;
        }
    }
}

    Ï∞∏Í≥† Ïù∏Ï¶ùÍ≥º Í∂åÌïú
    Í∞ÑÎã®Ìûà ÎßêÌïòÎ©¥ Ïù∏Ï¶ùÏùÄ Î°úÍ∑∏Ïù∏ Ïó¨Î∂Ä, Í∂åÌïúÏùÄ Î°úÍ∑∏Ïù∏Ìïú ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÍ∞Ä Ïñ¥Îñ†Ìïú Í∂åÌïú(ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê, Í¥ÄÎ¶¨Ïûê Îì±)ÏùÑ Í∞ÄÏßÄÍ≥† ÏûàÎäîÏßÄÏóê ÎåÄÌïú Î∂ÄÎ∂ÑÏù¥Îã§. Ïù∏Ï¶ùÍ≥º Í∂åÌïúÏùÄ Îã§Î•¥Îã§.

    PasswordEncoder ÏûëÏÑ±

    createDelegatingPasswordEncoder()Îäî Ìå®Ïä§ÏõåÎìú Ïù∏ÏΩîÎçî ÏÑ§Ï†ïÏùÑ Ìå©ÌÜ†Î¶¨Î°úÎ∂ÄÌÑ∞ ÏúÑÏûÑÌï¥ÏÑú Í∞ÄÏ†∏Ïò§Í≤†Îã§Îäî ÎúªÏù¥Îã§.

    @Bean
public PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder() {
    return PasswordEncoderFactories.createDelegatingPasswordEncoder();
}

    Spring Security ÏµúÏ¢Ö ÏΩîÎìú

    import com.test.projectboard.dto.UserAccountDto;
import com.test.projectboard.dto.security.BoardPrincipal;
import com.test.projectboard.repository.UserAccountRepository;
import org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.security.servlet.PathRequest;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;
import org.springframework.http.HttpMethod;
import org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.builders.HttpSecurity;
import org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService;
import org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException;
import org.springframework.security.crypto.factory.PasswordEncoderFactories;
import org.springframework.security.crypto.password.PasswordEncoder;
import org.springframework.security.web.SecurityFilterChain;

@Configuration
public class SecurityConfig {

    @Bean
    public SecurityFilterChain filterChain(HttpSecurity http) throws Exception {
        return http
                .authorizeHttpRequests(auth -> auth
                        .requestMatchers(
                                PathRequest.toStaticResources().atCommonLocations()
                        ).permitAll()
                        .mvcMatchers(
                                HttpMethod.GET,
                                "/",
                                "/articles",
                                "/articles/search-hashtag"
                        ).permitAll()
                        .anyRequest().authenticated()
                )
                .formLogin().and()
                .logout()
                .logoutSuccessUrl("/")
                .and()
                .build();
    }

    @Bean
    public UserDetailsService userDetailsService(UserAccountRepository userAccountRepository) {
        return username -> userAccountRepository
                .findById(username)
                .map(UserAccountDto::from)
                .map(BoardPrincipal::from)
                .orElseThrow(() -> new UsernameNotFoundException("ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÎ•º Ï∞æÏùÑ Ïàò ÏóÜÏäµÎãàÎã§. - username: " + username));
    }

    @Bean
    public PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder() {
        return PasswordEncoderFactories.createDelegatingPasswordEncoder();
    }
}

    Spring SecurityÏôÄ AuditorAware

    AuditorAwareÎ•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÏó¨ Î°úÍ∑∏Ïù∏Ìïú ÏÇ¨ÎûåÏùò Ï†ïÎ≥¥Î•º Í∞ÄÏ†∏Ïò¨ Ïàò ÏûàÎã§.

    import com.test.projectboard.dto.security.BoardPrincipal;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;
import org.springframework.data.domain.AuditorAware;
import org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.config.EnableJpaAuditing;
import org.springframework.security.core.Authentication;
import org.springframework.security.core.context.SecurityContext;
import org.springframework.security.core.context.SecurityContextHolder;

import java.util.Optional;

@EnableJpaAuditing
@Configuration
public class JpaConfig {

    @Bean
    public AuditorAware<String> auditorAware() {
        return () -> Optional.ofNullable(SecurityContextHolder.getContext())
                .map(SecurityContext::getAuthentication)
                .filter(Authentication::isAuthenticated)
                .map(Authentication::getPrincipal)
                .map(BoardPrincipal.class::cast)
                .map(BoardPrincipal::getUsername);
    }
}

    Reference.

    Spring Security without the WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter
